issue.title: [JS] Dockerize NodeJS Travis CI entry
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5807](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5807). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add to docker-compose, use in Travis CI instead of current scripts
